message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only justify purchasing it for $1100000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1300000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering the situation, I believe I can agree to purchase the product for $1250000. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

I appreciate your latest offer, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $1250000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1280000. I believe this is the best compromise we can reach at this point.

Thank you for your continued efforts to find a middle ground, Alice. I've carefully considered your last offer, and I believe I can agree to purchase the product for $1265000. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to move forward.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $1265000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1240000. I believe this is the best compromise we can reach at this point.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've reviewed your proposal, and I believe I can agree to purchase the product for $1255000. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you and allows us to conclude this negotiation.
